isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - CAB ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - MIRRORS - HEATED, LIGHTED AND POWER

svcproc.title: MIRRORS - HEATED, LIGHTED AND POWER
svcproc.para: Heated, lighted and motorized power mirrors are available as options. The lighted mirrors are part of the clearance light circuitry and come on with the headlights. With power mirrors, only the right (passenger side) mirror is powered and the switch is in the switch bank to the left of the instrument cluster. With heated mirrors, both mirrors are heated with the switch located in the left hand switch bank.
